channel.title: Photoshop Online
channel.description:
It seems as if an entire application can be remade in flash :) gotta love innovation
http://www.pixlr.com/app/

item.title: Photoshop Online
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

this is the versatility of actionscript. I could make a less basic version of that. Mine would be more like paint than photoshop but depending on how much i continue to develop my actionscript skills i may be able to get closer to an end result such as that. But that is still amazing work would take me a while to learn how to get that indepth and then actually make the end result

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop Online
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:241288”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=317612.msg2520262#msg2520262 date=1225842083]
The renders aren’t the same, infat half the shit isnt the same… shitty web page
[/quote]

Yea! This free flash web site didn’t perfectly duplicate the functionality of a 700mb, $400 dollar program that was written by a team of developers funded by a multi-million dollar company! It only partially replicates the functionality, what a shitty website!!

Are you people stupid or something?

It looks really good to me.[/quote]
right there, it doesnt have as many tools as photoshop etc.

Read full topic

item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:12, topic:241288”]Well, I mean it’s a nice concept. But it’s been done many times before already, and much more successfully. And Photoshop is actually $700.00. I find that this and Aviary are the best of the online image editors.

http://a.viary.com/home
https://www.photoshop.com/express/landing.html
http://www.splashup.com/[/quote]

Aviary is obviously the best, and here’s another:
http://www.flauntr.com/flauntr/

item.title: Photoshop Online
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:241288”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=317612.msg2520262#msg2520262 date=1225842083]
The renders aren’t the same, infat half the shit isnt the same… shitty web page
[/quote]

Yea! This free flash web site didn’t perfectly duplicate the functionality of a 700mb, $400 dollar program that was written by a team of developers funded by a multi-million dollar company! It only partially replicates the functionality, what a shitty website!!

Are you people stupid or something?

It looks really good to me.[/quote]

Well, I mean it’s a nice concept. But it’s been done many times before already, and much more successfully. And Photoshop is actually $700.00. I find that this and Aviary are the best of the online image editors.

http://a.viary.com/home
https://www.photoshop.com/express/landing.html
http://www.splashup.com/
